name: vault-controller
description: Securely read and edit local Markdown notes from your Clawdbot
author: Logan Yang

vault.sh.description: VPS-side wrapper that calls vaultctl on Mac via SSH

VAULT_SSH_USER.description: Mac username (auto-detected by tunnel-setup.sh, or run 'whoami' on your Mac)

VAULT_SSH_PORT.description: SSH tunnel port where Mac is reachable

setup.mac: Clone the repo on your Mac and run: ./install.sh ~/YourNotesFolder
